result.arabic_text: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ مَسَّنَا وَأَهۡلَنَا ٱلضُّرُّ وَجِئۡنَا بِبِضَٰعَةٖ مُّزۡجَىٰةٖ فَأَوۡفِ لَنَا ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَتَصَدَّقۡ عَلَيۡنَآۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُتَصَدِّقِينَ
result.translation: Bahavuye rero basubira muri Misiri, bagize ngo barinjiye kwa Yusufu, bamubwiye bati: “Ewe mutware! Twaratewe n’inzara, twebwe n’umuryango wacu wose, ni ko kuza twibangikanije iki kiguzi gidashemeye, turasavye rero ko mwotugerera ibikwiye nk’uko mwahora mubigenza ku kiguzi nk’ico nyene, n’aho kidashemeye. Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, Irahemba abafasha abandi bakabaha imperezwa”.
